person.name: Julia
person.topic: I care for the poor.
Well.
Self preservation is the first law of nature; self sacrifice the highest rule of grace.
Within this house are many poor and destitute souls.Wilt thou help?I would join thee.Bum.

person.name: Zircon
person.topic: I forge weapons.
Quite well.
I make the very best!Seek thee a weapon?Ask at the counter!Hmmm.
Ah, yes, the mystic weapons, and armour, my greatest work! Those I gave unto Sir Simon and Lady Tessa.

person.name: Bob the Beggar
person.topic: I have none, help me.
I am very sick, help me!
I need money to cure my sickness.
I have terminal leg rot.Hast thou any money?Then please share it with me!Then join me and we can beg together!

person.name: Linda Sue
person.topic: I'm an undernourished beggar girl.
I am hungry.
I have not eaten in days.Could thou spare a nibble of food?I would greatly appreciate that.Oh, I see.
Oh, thou art a kind soul!

person.name: Gimble
person.topic: I shall die soon.
I am barely conscious.
I suffer from a tsetse byte!
I will soon sleep forever.Could thou spare a gold piece so I may buy a last drink?Remember Azure knows of the rune!I am saddened.

person.name: Jude
person.topic: To redeem myself!
Ailing.
I will not speak of my sin!
I used it!If I help thee wilt thou swear to only use it at the mouth of the abyss to destroy it?It can be found at lat-P'F" long-M'F" on the darkest night!Oh.

person.name: Alkerion
person.topic: I am a peasant, I hear many things.
I am old and weak.
What does thou wish to know?
The stone of sacrifice is orange in color and used in the altar rooms of love and courage!

person.name: Mike Ward
person.topic: I am trying to get a room.
Well enough.
I have travelled clear from Skara Brae.
The rune of our city is missing!Know thee of the rune?It is the key to the shrine of spirituality!It is not in Skara Brae.

person.name: Alex
person.topic: I give out flowers. Here you are!
Fine, thanks.
The way I figure it, if thou art kind to others they will have reason to be kind in return!
Yes, give all that thou can unto the needy!Wilt thou give?Good.Alas.

person.name: Shentis
person.topic: I welcome thee unto Minoc, city of sacrifice!
OK.
Self-sacrifice is a needed virtue!
Avatars strive to be virtuous.Dost thou strive for virtue?Then perhaps thou shalt become an avatar!An avatar thou art not!

person.name: Singsong
person.topic: I sing songs!
Very well indeed!
I sing songs!
Very well, the raven sings, the raven saw and in the corn he sayeth 'CAH'.Dost thou like it?Thanks.Too bad...

person.name: Damon
person.topic: I stand here and think.
Fine.
Oh, just about things.Can't a man just think to himself?Well I hope so!Oh, yes I can thou bandersnatch!
Listen to the bard's song for in its verse lies the key!

person.name: Mischief
person.topic: This and that.
O.K. I guess.
And that...
The rune of sacrifice is hard to get. It lies within the fires of the forge!Hast thou the rune?Then ask Alkerion of the stone!Return when thou dost find it!

person.name: Azure
person.topic: I carve runes.
O.K.
I carve runes for passage into the shrines!Dost thou seek a rune?Which?I see.
Ask my sister, Mischief.

person.name: Merida
person.topic: I seek the wisdom of the shrine of sacrifice.
Been better.
But first I need the mantra!Know ye the mantra?Good!The shrine is on a lake to the east!
I am told that a hidden shepherd knows the mantra.

person.name: a guard
person.topic: To guard of course.
Quite.
I often wonder if I will ever have to give my life in the line of duty.Understand my dilemma?Of course, if it came down to it, I hope I would do it!Too bad.
One life for many!
